Try executing this chunk by clicking the *Run* button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing *Cmd+Shift+Enter*. 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
big_data <-read_csv("taxi_2010.csv")
#df1 <-subset(t, select = c(2, 4, 6, 7, 20)) %>%
#  filter( PULocationID == 255 | PULocationID == 256 | (between(pickup_latitude, 40.697936,
#    40.725179) & between(pickup_longitude, -73.969910, -73.936482))) %>%
#  mutate(month =  month(as.POSIXct(tpep_pickup_datetime, format = "%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S"))) %>%
#  group_by(month) %>% tally() %>%
#  mutate(passenger_count = passenger_count * n) %>%
#  group_by(month) %>% summarise(t = sum(passenger_count)) %>%
#  na.omit()
                      # 2012/11/10 c(3, 10, 11)
                      # 2014/3 c(2, 6, 7)
df1 <-subset(big_data, select = c(2, 6, 7)) %>%
  filter(between(Start_Lat, 40.697936, 40.725179) & between(Start_Lon, -73.969910, -73.936482)) %>%
  mutate(month =  month(as.POSIXct(Trip_Pickup_DateTime, format = "%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S"))) %>%
  group_by(month) %>% tally() 

# Repeat above algorithm for dropoffs
#df2 <-subset(big_data, select = c(3, 4, 10, 11, 21)) %>%
#  filter( DOLocationID == 255 | DOLocationID == 256 | (between(dropoff_latitude, 40.697936,
#    40.725179) & between(dropoff_longitude, -73.969910, -73.936482))) %>%
#  mutate(month =  month(as.POSIXct(tpep_dropoff_datetime, format = "%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S"))) %>%
#  group_by(month, passenger_count) %>% tally() %>%
#  mutate(passenger_count = passenger_count * n) %>%
#  group_by(month) %>% summarise(t = sum(passenger_count)) %>%
#  na.omit()
                        # 2013/12/11/10   c(3, 10, 11)
                        # 2014   c(3, 8, 9)
df2 <-subset(big_data, select = c(3, 10, 11)) %>%
  filter(between(End_Lat, 40.697936, 40.725179) & between(End_Lon, -73.969910, -73.936482)) %>%
  mutate(month =  month(as.POSIXct(Trip_Dropoff_DateTime, format = "%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S"))) %>%
  group_by(month) %>% tally()

df3 <- merge(df2, df1, by = "month", all.x = TRUE) %>%
  mutate(tot_pass = n.x + n.y) %>%
  subset(select = c(1, 4))

write_csv(df3, "wb_taxi_2011_NOPASS.csv")
```
